name: coding-test
description: This project is a solution to the InterOpera coding test. It consists of a backend API built with FastAPI (Python) and a frontend application built with Next.js (React). The application displays sales performance data for representatives and includes an optional AI endpoint feature integrated with the Google Gemini API.

name: random-quote-machine
description: A React application that displays random quotes.

name: markdown-previewer
description: A React application that previews Markdown content.

name: drum-machine
description: A React application that functions as a drum machine.

name: my-calculator
description: A React application that functions as a calculator.

name: 25-5-clock
description: A React application that functions as a Pomodoro timer (25 + 5 clock).
